name: Shape Chef
description:
Shape Chef

Originally made in 72 hours for GeoJam 2022.

In a world of geometrically-based comestibles, you have been given the grueling role of a sous chef. Through the rigorous challenges of basic math, color combination, and fancy textures, you must fight to assemble the correct side dishes that complement a main ingredient. Push the limits of your noggin’, and rise to the top of the shapely pile in the kitchen conundrums of Shape Chef! 

"It's like if Overcooked was made by elementary school teachers." - Some Guy Probably

Credits
  • Design, development, art, and music all created by Ben Sergent V & Tristan Spakes.
  • Music composed via beepbox.co
  • Sound effects from freesound.org and freesfx.co.uk
